text: Fatih Terim (born 4 September 1953) is a Turkish football manager. He managed the Turkey national football team from 2013 to 2017. He has been the manager of Galatasaray S.K. since 2017. == Club career statistics == Club Season League Cup Other Europe Total Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Adana Demirspor 1973–74 28 2 - - - - - - 28 2 Total 28 2 - - - - - - 28 2 Galatasaray 1974–75 30 2 - - 3 0 - - 33 2 1975–76 30 3 8 1 4 1 4 0 46 5 1976–77 29 2 2 0 - - - - 31 2 1977–78 29 2 5 0 2 0 - - 36 2 1978–79 27 2 2 2 3 1 2 1 34 6 1979–80 30 2 10 0 2 0 2 0 44 2 1980–81 27 2 6 0 1 0 - - 34 2 1981–82 28 0 9 1 3 0 - - 40 1 1982–83 29 1 2 0 2 1 - - 33 2 1983–84 28 0 5 0 2 0 - - 35 0 1984–85 30 0 8 3 3 0 - - 41 3 Total 317 16 57 7 25 3 8 1 407 27 Career total 345 18 57 7 25 3 8 1 435 29 ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Turkish footballers Category:Turkish football managers Category:Galatasaray S.K.
